sentence.Network_en: Whatever troubles arise, we'll have peace of mind amidst seeming chaos.
sentence.Network_cn: 无论出现什么样的麻烦，我们都会在貌似混乱的情形中保持平和的心态。

sentence.Network_en: Amidst the current bunch of nonentities, he is a towering figure.
sentence.Network_cn: 在当前这帮无足轻重的人里面，他算是鹤立鸡群。

sentence.Network_en: The bridge was completed in 1811 amidst much rejoicing.
sentence.Network_cn: 大桥于1811年竣工,当时大家欢欣鼓舞.

list.abs: retail sales growth , even amidst deflation , has shown resilience of late , partly biased upwards by spending on items associated with the pickup in policy-driven fixed investment .虽然受到通货紧缩的影响，近来的零售额增长仍旧强劲，部分原因可能是受到了政策驱动的固定资产投资的拉动。
amidst mists and coldest frosts , with stoutest wrists and loudest boasts , he thrusts his fist against the posts and still insists he sees the ghosts .他吼叫着，挥起拳头，用有力的手腕，向柱子打去，并坚信地说他在薄雾与寒霜中看到了鬼魂。
the tower stood amidst the ruins ., 塔矗立在废墟中.
elevating the hospital brand for service amidst innovative progress ., 在创新进取中提升医院服务品牌.

entry.def: Amidst means the same as amid .

auth_sentence.content: The fierce menace was delivered amidst frowning groups of...nobles.
auth_sentence.res_content: The fierce menace was delivered amidst frowning groups of...nobles.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The fierce menace was delivered amidst frowning groups of...nobles.

auth_sentence.content: Amidst the benedictions of tens of thousands of people.
auth_sentence.res_content: Amidst the benedictions of tens of thousands of people.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Amidst the benedictions of tens of thousands of people.

auth_sentence.content: Yet one thing amidst all this is certain.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet one thing amidst all this is certain.

sentences.en: The bridge was completed in 1811 amidst much rejoicing.
sentences.cn: 大桥于1811 年竣工，当时大家欢欣鼓舞。

sentences.en: The cat managed to find a spot to sleep amidst all the clutter of my study.
sentences.cn: 貓儿设法在我一片凌乱的书房中找了个地方睡觉。
